text: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre is a 1948 American Mexican adventure drama movie directed by John Huston and was based on the 1927 novel of the same name by B. Traven. It stars Humphrey Bogart, Walter Huston, Tim Holt, Bruce Bennett, Barton MacLane, Alfonso Bedoya and was distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. It was nominated for 4 Oscars and won 3 Academy Awards in 1949. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1948 adventure movies Category:1948 drama movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Mexican adventure movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about treasure hunting Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by John Huston
title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
